author: mpaulucci
content: Thanks. So that means that the "on_attestation" (https://eth2book.info/capella/part3/forkchoice/phase0/#on_attestation) handler is only used when you are a validator (to receive attestations for your subnet/committee)?

author: potuz
content: That handler is called when you receive any attestation, via gossip or not. All attestations in the block are also sent to forkchoice, if you're well connected you should have already seen them all, but otherwise you'll still get some new attestations from the block

author: potuz
content: Also the beacon registers for the aggregation topics regardless of being serving validators or not. It should be collecting attestations to determine its view of the head
